name: Lord-Castellant

abilities.name: Light of Azyr
abilities.description: If you roll a 6 for the attack roll when using Warding Lantern, the target suffers D3 wounds and is then stunned.

abilities.name: Healing Light
abilities.description: Put the hero dice here until the end of the round. When you remove the dice, remove a wound marker from all heroes in the party who are on the board.

renown: If you stun 3 or more adversaries with the Warding Lantern in a turn, gain 1 renown.
